trans-unit.target: 科特林-STDLIB / 科特林 / 堆栈跟踪

trans-unit.source: @MustBeDocumented specifies that the annotation is part of the public API and should be included in the class or method signature shown in the generated API documentation.
trans-unit.target: @MustBeDocumented 指定注释是公共API的一部分，应包含在生成的API文档中显示的类或方法签名中。

trans-unit.source: @Repeatable allows using the same annotation on a single element multiple times;
trans-unit.target: @Repeatable 允许在单个元素上多次使用相同的注释；

trans-unit.source: @Retention specifies whether the annotation is stored in the compiled class files and whether it's visible through reflection at runtime (by default, both are true);
trans-unit.target: @Retention 指定注释是否存储在已编译的类文件中，以及是否在运行时通过反射可见（默认情况下，两者均为true）；

trans-unit.source: @Target specifies the possible kinds of elements which can be annotated with the annotation (classes, functions, properties, expressions etc.);
trans-unit.target: @Target 指定可以用注释注释的元素的可能种类（类，函数，属性，表达式等）；

trans-unit.source: Collection<T> is the root of the collection hierarchy. This interface represents the common behavior of a read-only collection: retrieving size, checking item membership, and so on. Collection inherits from the Iterable<T> interface that defines the operations for iterating elements. You can use Collection as a parameter of a function that applies to different collection types. For more specific cases, use the Collection's inheritors: List and Set.
trans-unit.target: Collection<T> 是集合层次结构的根。此接口表示只读集合的​​常见行为：检索大小，检查项目成员资格等。 Collection 继承自 Iterable<T> 接口，该接口定义用于迭代元素的操作。您可以将 Collection 用作适用于不同集合类型的函数的参数。对于更具体的情况，请使用 Collection 的继承者： List 和 Set 。

trans-unit.source: List<T> stores elements in a specified order and provides indexed access to them. Indices start from zero – the index of the first element – and go to lastIndex which is the (list.size - 1).
trans-unit.target: List<T> 以指定顺序存储元素，并提供对它们的索引访问。索引从零开始（第一个元素的索引），然后转到 lastIndex ，它是 (list.size - 1) 。

trans-unit.source: Map<K, V> is not an inheritor of the Collection interface; however, it's a Kotlin collection type as well. A Map stores key-value pairs (or entries); keys are unique, but different keys can be paired with equal values. The Map interface provides specific functions, such as access to value by key, searching keys and values, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Map<K, V> 不是 Collection 接口的继承者；但是，它也是Kotlin集合类型。甲 Map 存储键值对（或条目）; 键是唯一的，但是不同的键可以与相等的值配对。的 Map 接口提供特定的功能，例如通过键访问值，搜索键和值，并依此类推。

trans-unit.source: MutableCollection is a Collection with write operations, such as add and remove.
trans-unit.target: MutableCollection 是具有写操作（例如 add 和 remove ）的 Collection 。

trans-unit.source: clear() removes all elements from a list and leaves it empty.
trans-unit.target: clear() 从列表中删除所有元素，并将其留空。

trans-unit.source: MutableList<T> is a List with list-specific write operations, for example, to add or remove an element at a specific position.
MutableList is a List with list-specific write operations, for example, to add or remove an element at a specific position.
trans-unit.target: MutableList 是具有特定于列表的写操作的 List ，例如，用于在特定位置添加或删除元素。

trans-unit.source: MutableMap is a Map with map write operations, for example, you can add a new key-value pair or update the value associated with the given key.
trans-unit.target: MutableMap 是具有映射写操作的 Map ，例如，您可以添加新的键值对或更新与给定键关联的值。

trans-unit.source: MutableSet is a Set with write operations from MutableCollection.

Set<T> stores unique elements; their order is generally undefined. null elements are unique as well: a Set can contain only one null. Two sets are equal if they have the same size, and for each element of a set there is an equal element in the other set.
trans-unit.target: Set<T> 存储唯一元素；它们的顺序通常是不确定的。 null 元素也是唯一的： Set 只能包含一个 null 。如果两个集合的大小相同，则两个集合相等，并且对于一个集合中的每个元素，另一个集合中存在一个相等的元素。

trans-unit.source: addAll() adds every element of the argument object to a list or a set. The argument can be an Iterable, a Sequence, or an Array. The types of the receiver and the argument may be different, for example, you can add all items from a Set to a List.
trans-unit.target: addAll() 将参数对象的每个元素添加到列表或集合中。参数可以是 Iterable ， Sequence 或 Array 。接收者和参数的类型可能不同，例如，您可以将 Set 中的所有项目添加到 List 中。

trans-unit.source: aggregate() applies a given operation subsequently to all the elements in each group and returns the result. This is the generic way to perform any operations on a Grouping. Use it to implement custom operations when fold or reduce are not enough.
trans-unit.target: aggregate() 随后将给定操作应用于每个组中的所有元素，并返回结果。这是对 Grouping 执行任何操作的通用方法。当折叠或缩小不够时，可使用它来实现自定义操作。

trans-unit.source: all() returns true if all elements match the given predicate. Note that all() returns true when called with any valid predicate on an empty collection. Such behavior is known in logic as vacuous truth.
trans-unit.target: all() 如果所有元素都匹配给定谓词，则 all（）返回 true 。请注意，在空集合上使用任何有效谓词调用 all() 时,返回 true 。这种行为在逻辑上被称为虚无真相。

trans-unit.source: any() returns true if at least one element matches the given predicate.
trans-unit.target: any() 如果至少一个元素与给定谓词匹配，则 any（）返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: asReversed() called on a mutable list returns another mutable list which is a reversed view of the original list. Changes in that view are reflected in the original list. The following example shows sorting functions for mutable lists:
trans-unit.target: asReversed() 在可变列表上调用的 asReversed（）返回另一个可变列表，它是原始列表的反向视图。该视图中的更改将反映在原始列表中。以下示例显示了可变列表的排序功能：

trans-unit.source: average() returns the average value of elements in the collection of numbers;
trans-unit.target: average() 返回数字集合中元素的平均值；

trans-unit.source: count() returns the number of elements in a collection;
dropLastWhile() is the opposite to takeLastWhile() with the same predicate: it returns the elements from the beginning to the last one not matching the predicate.
trans-unit.target: dropLastWhile() 与具有相同谓词的 takeLastWhile() 相反：它从开头到最后一个与谓词不匹配的元素返回元素。

trans-unit.source: dropWhile() is the opposite to takeWhile() with the same predicate: it returns the elements from the first one not matching the predicate to the end.
trans-unit.target: dropWhile() 与带有相同谓词的 takeWhile() 相反：它从第一个不匹配谓词的元素返回到末尾。

trans-unit.source: eachCount() counts the elements in each group.

elementAtOrElse() additionally takes a lambda function that maps an Int argument to an instance of the collection element type. When called with an out-of-bounds position, the elementAtOrElse() returns the result of the lambda on the given value.
trans-unit.target: elementAtOrElse() 还采用了一个lambda函数，该函数将 Int 参数映射到集合元素类型的实例。当使用界外位置调用时， elementAtOrElse() 返回给定值上的lambda结果。

trans-unit.source: elementAtOrNull() returns null when the specified position is out of the collection bounds.
trans-unit.target: elementAtOrNull() 当指定位置超出集合范围时， elementAtOrNull（）返回null。

trans-unit.source: fill() simply replaces all the collection elements with the specified value.
trans-unit.target: fill() 只是用指定的值替换所有collection元素。

trans-unit.source: filterIsInstance() returns collection elements of a given type. Being called on a List<Any>, filterIsInstance<T>() returns a List<T>, thus allowing you to call functions of the T type on its items.
trans-unit.target: filterIsInstance() 返回给定类型的集合元素。在 List<Any> 上被调用时， filterIsInstance<T>() 返回 List<T> ，从而允许您在其项上调用 T 类型的函数。

trans-unit.source: filterNotNull() returns all non-null elements. Being called on a List<T?>, filterNotNull() returns a List<T: Any>, thus allowing you to treat the elements as non-null objects.
trans-unit.target: filterNotNull() 返回所有非null元素。被称为在 List<T?> ， filterNotNull() 返回一个 List<T: Any> ，从而使你对待元素非空的对象。

trans-unit.source: fold() and reduce() perform fold and reduce operations on each group as a separate collection and return the results.
trans-unit.target: fold() 和 reduce() 作为单独的集合对每个组执行 fold和reduce操作，并返回结果。

trans-unit.source: getOrDefault() returns the specified default value if the key is not found.
trans-unit.target: getOrDefault() 如果找不到密钥，则 getOrDefault（）返回指定的默认值。

trans-unit.source: getOrElse() lets you provide the function for calculating the default value to return if the index isn't present in the collection.
trans-unit.target: getOrElse() 使您可以提供用于计算默认值的函数，如果集合中不存在索引，则返回该默认值。

trans-unit.source: getOrElse() works the same way as for lists: the values for non-existent keys are returned from the given lambda function.
trans-unit.target: getOrElse() 的工作方式与列表相同：不存在的键的值从给定的lambda函数返回。

trans-unit.source: indexOfFirst() returns the index of the first element matching the predicate or -1 if there are no such elements.
trans-unit.target: indexOfFirst() 返回与谓词匹配的第一个元素的索引；如果没有此类元素，则返回 -1 。

trans-unit.source: indexOfLast() returns the index of the last element matching the predicate or -1 if there are no such elements.
trans-unit.target: indexOfLast() 返回与谓词匹配的最后一个元素的索引；如果没有此类元素，则返回 -1 。

trans-unit.source: maxBy()/minBy() take a selector function and return the element for which it returns the largest or the smallest value.
trans-unit.target: maxBy() / minBy() 使用选择器函数，并返回为其返回最大或最小值的元素。

trans-unit.source: maxWith()/minWith() take a Comparator object and return the largest or smallest element according to that Comparator.
trans-unit.target: maxWith() / minWith() 接受 Comparator 对象，并根据该 Comparator 返回最大或最小元素。

trans-unit.source: min() and max() return the smallest and the largest element respectively;
trans-unit.target: min() 和 max() 分别返回最小和最大元素；

trans-unit.source: none() returns true if none of the elements match the given predicate.
trans-unit.target: none() 如果没有元素与给定谓词匹配，则 none（）返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: removeAll() removes all elements that are present in the argument collection. Alternatively, you can call it with a predicate as an argument; in this case the function removes all elements for which the predicate yields true.
trans-unit.target: removeAll() 删除参数集合中存在的所有元素。另外，您可以使用谓词作为参数来调用它；在这种情况下，函数将删除谓词为 true 的所有元素。

trans-unit.source: retainAll() is the opposite of removeAll(): it removes all elements except the ones from the argument collection. When used with a predicate, it leaves only elements that match it.
trans-unit.target: retainAll() 与 removeAll() 相反：它将删除参数集合中除元素之外的所有元素。与谓词一起使用时，仅保留与之匹配的元素。

trans-unit.source: slice() returns a list of the collection elements with given indices. The indices may be passed either as a range or as a collection of integer values.
trans-unit.target: slice() 返回具有给定索引的集合元素的列表。索引可以作为范围或作为整数值的集合传递。

trans-unit.source: sum() returns the sum of elements in the collection of numbers;
trans-unit.target: sum() 返回数字集合中元素的总和；

trans-unit.source: sumBy() applies functions that return Int values on collection elements.
trans-unit.target: sumBy() 应用在集合元素上返回 Int 值的函数。
sumByDouble() 与返回 Double 的函数一起使用。

trans-unit.source: takeLastWhile() is similar to takeLast(): it takes the range of elements matching the predicate from the end of the collection. The first element of the range is the element next to the last element not matching the predicate. If the last collection element doesn't match the predicate, the result is empty;
trans-unit.target: takeLastWhile() 是类似于 takeLast() ：它需要匹配从收集的端部的断言元素的范围内。范围的第一个元素是与谓词不匹配的最后一个元素旁边的元素。如果最后一个collection元素与谓词不匹配，则结果为空；否则，结果为空。

trans-unit.source: takeWhile() is take() with a predicate: it takes the elements up to but excluding the first one not matching the predicate. If the first collection element doesn't match the predicate, the result is empty.
trans-unit.target: takeWhile() 是带有谓词的 take() ：它将元素带到但不包括与谓词不匹配的第一个元素，但不包括这些元素。如果第一个collection元素与谓词不匹配，则结果为空。

trans-unit.source: Delegates.observable() takes two arguments: the initial value and a handler for modifications. The handler gets called every time we assign to the property (after the assignment has been performed). It has three parameters: a property being assigned to, the old value and the new one:
trans-unit.target: Delegates.observable() 具有两个参数：初始值和用于修改的处理程序。每次我们分配给属性时（在执行分配之后），处理程序都会被调用。它具有三个参数：分配给的属性，旧值和新值：

trans-unit.source: Delegates.observable() takes two arguments: the initial value and a handler for modifications. The handler is called every time we assign to the property (after the assignment has been performed). It has three parameters: a property being assigned to, the old value and the new one:

lazy() is a function that takes a lambda and returns an instance of Lazy<T> which can serve as a delegate for implementing a lazy property: the first call to get() executes the lambda passed to lazy() and remembers the result, subsequent calls to get() simply return the remembered result.
trans-unit.target: lazy() 是一个函数，它需要一个lambda并返回 Lazy<T> 的实例，该实例可以用作实现lazy属性的委托：对 get() 的第一次调用执行传递给 lazy() 的lambda并记住结果，随后对 get() 的调用仅返回记忆的结果。

trans-unit.source: IllegalStateException is thrown on iterating the returned sequence from the second time.
trans-unit.target: 从第二次迭代返回的序列时，抛出IllegalStateException。

trans-unit.source: from and until must be finite otherwise the behavior is unspecified.
trans-unit.target: 从和至一定是有限的，否则的行为是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: from and until must be finite otherwise the behavior is unspecified.
Kotlin Android Extensions is a compiler extension that allows you to get rid of findViewById() calls in your code and to replace them with synthetic compiler-generated properties.
trans-unit.target: Kotlin Android扩展是一个编译器扩展，它使您可以摆脱代码中的 findViewById() 调用，并将其替换为合成的编译器生成的属性。

trans-unit.source: Creating a multiplatform Kotlin library teaches how to create a multiplatform library available for JVM, JS, and Native and which can be used from any other common code (for example, shared with Android and iOS). It also shows how to write tests which will be executed on all platforms and use an efficient implementation provided by a specific platform.
Sequence type that represents lazily evaluated collections. Top-level functions for instantiating sequences and extension functions for sequences.

Static members - replaced with companion objects, top-level functions, extension functions, or @JvmStatic.

Mutable collections support operations for changing the collection contents, for example, adding or removing elements. On this page, we'll describe write operations available for all implementations of MutableCollection. For more specific operations available for List and Map, see List Specific Operations and Map Specific Operations respectively.

trans-unit.target: 可变映射提供特定于映射的写操作。这些操作使您可以使用基于键的值访问来更改地图内容。

Keeping the Language Modern and Comfortable Updates are among the fundamental principles in Kotlin Language Design. The former says that constructs which obstruct language evolution should be removed, and the latter says that this removal should be well-communicated beforehand to make code migration as smooth as possible.
externName controls the name of top level function, shortName controls the short name. If externName is empty, no top level declaration is being created.

Competitive programming is a mind sport where contestants write programs to solve precisely specified algorithmic problems within strict constraints. Problems can range from simple ones that can be solved by any software developer and require little code to get a correct solution, to complex ones that require knowledge of special algorithms, data structures, and a lot of practice. While not being specifically designed for competitive programming, Kotlin incidentally fits well in this domain, reducing the typical amount of boilerplate that a programmer needs to write and read while working with the code almost to the level offered by dynamically-typed scripting languages, while having tooling and performance of a statically-typed language.
trans-unit.target: 竞争性编程是一项智力运动，参赛者编写程序以在严格的限制内解决精确指定的算法问题。问题的范围从任何软件开发人员都可以解决的，只需很少的代码即可获得正确解决方案的简单问题到需要特殊算法，数据结构和大量实践知识的复杂问题。尽管Kotlin并非专门为竞争性编程而设计，但它恰好适合该领域，从而减少了程序员在处理代码时需要编写和读取的典型样板，几乎达到了动态类型的脚本语言所提供的水平，同时具有静态类型语言的工具和性能。

trans-unit.source: kotlinx.serialization is a library which provides multiplatform support for (de)serializing objects in Kotlin. Previously, it was a separate project, but since Kotlin 1.3, it ships with the Kotlin compiler distribution on par with the other compiler plugins. The main difference is that you don't need to manually watch out for the Serialization IDE Plugin being compatible with the Kotlin IDE Plugin version you're using: now the Kotlin IDE Plugin already includes serialization!
trans-unit.target: kotlinx.serialization是一个库，为Kotlin中的对象（反序列化）提供多平台支持。以前，它是一个单独的项目，但是从Kotlin 1.3开始，它与Kotlin编译器发行版一起提供，与其他编译器插件同等。主要区别在于您无需手动注意与您使用的Kotlin IDE插件版本兼容的序列化IDE插件：现在，Kotlin IDE插件已经包含序列化！

trans-unit.source: newSingleThreadContext creates a thread for the coroutine to run. A dedicated thread is a very expensive resource. runBlocking and coroutineScope may look similar because they both wait for their body and all its children to complete. The main difference is that the runBlocking method blocks the current thread for waiting, while coroutineScope just suspends, releasing the underlying thread for other usages. Because of that difference, runBlocking is a regular function and coroutineScope is a suspending function.

Creating a KMM application shows how to create a mobile application that works on Android and iOS with the help of the KMM plugin for Android Studio. Create, run, and test your first multiplatform mobile application.
Micronaut is a modern, JVM-based, full-stack framework for building modular, easily testable microservice and serverless applications. It comes with a lot of built-in, handy features.

Building Web Applications with React and Kotlin/JS guides you through the process of building a simple web application using the React framework, shows how a typesafe Kotlin DSL for HTML makes it convenient to build reactive DOM elements, and illustrates how to use third-party React components, and how to obtain information from APIs, while writing the whole application logic in pure Kotlin/JS.

Building a Full Stack Web App with Kotlin Multiplatform teaches the concepts behind building an application that targets Kotlin/JVM and Kotlin/JS by building a client-server application that makes use of common code, serialization, and other multiplatform paradigms. It also provides a brief introduction into working with Ktor both as a server- and client-side framework.

Building a full stack web app with Kotlin Multiplatform teaches the concepts behind building an application that targets Kotlin/JVM and Kotlin/JS by building a client-server application that makes use of shared code, serialization, and other multiplatform paradigms. It also provides a brief introduction to working with Ktor both as a server- and client-side framework.

trans-unit.source: CValuesRef is designed to be used as Kotlin representation of pointer-typed parameters of C functions. When passing CPointer as CValuesRef to the Kotlin binding method, the C function receives exactly this pointer. Passing CValues has nearly the same semantics as passing by value: the C function receives the pointer to the temporary copy of these values, and the caller can't observe the modifications to this copy. The copy is valid until the C function returns. There are also other implementations of CValuesRef that provide temporary pointer, e.g. Kotlin Native specific refTo functions to pass primitive arrays directly to native.
trans-unit.target: CValuesRef设计为用作C函数的指针型参数的Kotlin表示。当将CPointer作为CValuesRef传递给Kotlin绑定方法时，C函数正好接收此指针。传递CValues的语义与按值传递的语义几乎相同：C函数接收指向这些值的临时副本的指针，而调用者无法观察对该副本的修改。该副本在C函数返回之前一直有效。也有其他提供临时指针的CValuesRef实现，例如Kotlin Native特定的refTo函数，将原始数组直接传递给native。

trans-unit.source: -Xjsr305={strict|warn|ignore} to set up the behavior for non-@UnderMigration annotations. trans-unit.source: ?. is nice if you want to call a function on something that might be null. But what if you want to call a function that takes a non-null parameter, but the value you want to pass for that parameter might be null? Try run(), which is an extension function on Any? that takes a lambda with receiver as a parameter and invokes it on the value that it's called on, and use ?. to call run() only if the object is non-null:
trans-unit.target: ?. 如果您想在可能为null的东西上调用函数，那就很好了。但是，如果您要调用一个采用非null参数的函数，但要为该参数传递的值可能为null怎么办？试试 run() ，这是对 Any? 的扩展功能吗？它以带有接收方的lambda作为参数，并在其调用的值上调用它，并使用 ?. 仅在对象为非null时才调用 run() ：

trans-unit.source: @Parcelize requires all serialized properties to be declared in the primary constructor. Also, @Parcelize can't be applied if some of the primary constructor parameters are not properties.
trans-unit.target: @Parcelize 要求在主构造函数中声明所有序列化的属性。Android扩展程序会针对每个属性发出警告，并在类主体中声明一个支持字段。另外，如果某些主要构造函数参数不是属性，则无法应用 @Parcelize 。

CoroutineExceptionHandler is invoked only on uncaught exceptions — exceptions that were not handled in any other way. In particular, all children coroutines (coroutines created in the context of another Job) delegate handling of their exceptions to their parent coroutine, which also delegates to the parent, and so on until the root, so the CoroutineExceptionHandler installed in their context is never used. In addition to that, async builder always catches all exceptions and represents them in the resulting Deferred object, so its CoroutineExceptionHandler has no effect either.

trans-unit.source: K - the type of map keys. The map is invariant in its key type, as it can accept key as a parameter (of containsKey for example) and return it in keys set.

trans-unit.source: Kotlin/Native installation provides a wide spectrum of examples demonstrating the use of platform libraries. See samples for details.
trans-unit.target: Kotlin/Native 安装提供了广泛的示例，展示了平台库的使用。有关详细信息，请参见示例。

trans-unit.source: MigrationStatus.IGNORE makes the compiler ignore the nullability annotation completely.
trans-unit.target: MigrationStatus.IGNORE 使编译器完全忽略可空性注释。

trans-unit.source: MigrationStatus.STRICT makes annotation work as any plain nullability annotation, i.e. report errors for the inappropriate usages and affect the types in the annotated declarations as they are seen in Kotlin;
trans-unit.target: MigrationStatus.STRICT 使注释可以像任何普通的可空性注释一样工作，即报告错误用法的错误并影响注释声明中的类型（如在Kotlin中看到的那样）；

trans-unit.source: MyFrameworkAnnotation is annotated with the all-open meta-annotation com.my.Annotation, so it becomes an all-open annotation as well.
trans-unit.target: MyFrameworkAnnotation 使用全开放式元注释 com.my.Annotation 进行注释，因此它也成为全开放式注释。

trans-unit.source: NSMutableString Objective-C class is not available from Kotlin. All instances of NSMutableString are copied when passed to Kotlin.
trans-unit.target: NSMutableString Objective-C类从Kotlin不可用。 NSMutableString 的所有实例在传递给Kotlin时都会被复制。

trans-unit.source: NSNumber type is not automatically translated to Kotlin primitive types when used as a Swift/Objective-C parameter type or return value. The reason is that NSNumber type doesn't provide enough information about a wrapped primitive value type, i.e. NSNumber is statically not known to be a e.g. Byte, Boolean, or Double. So Kotlin primitive values should be cast to/from NSNumber manually (see below).
trans-unit.target: NSNumber 当用作Swift / Objective-C参数类型或返回值时，NSNumber类型不会自动转换为Kotlin基本类型。原因是 NSNumber 类型没有提供有关包装的原始值类型的足够信息，即 NSNumber 在静态上未知为 Byte ， Boolean 或 Double 。因此，应该手动将Kotlin原始值强制转换为 NSNumber 或从NSNumber强制转换（请参阅下文）。

trans-unit.source: NaN is considered greater than any other element including POSITIVE_INFINITY
trans-unit.target: NaN 被认为大于任何其他元素，包括 POSITIVE_INFINITY

trans-unit.source: NativePlacement represents native memory with functions similar to malloc and free. There are several implementations of NativePlacement. The global one is called with kotlinx.cinterop.nativeHeap and don't forget to call the nativeHeap.free(..) function to free the memory after use.
trans-unit.target: NativePlacement 表示本机内存，其功能类似于 malloc 和 free 。有 NativePlacement 的几种实现。全局 kotlinx.cinterop.nativeHeap 用kotlinx.cinterop.nativeHeap调用，不要忘记调用 nativeHeap.free(..) 函数以在使用后释放内存。

trans-unit.source: NoSuchElementException - if no such character is found.

trans-unit.target: NoSuchElementException -当映射不包含指定键的值并且没有为该映射提供隐式默认值时。

trans-unit.source: NoSuchElementException - when the map doesn't contain value for the property name and doesn't provide an implicit default (see withDefault).
trans-unit.target: NoSuchElementException -当映射不包含属性名称的值并且不提供隐式默认值时（请参见withDefault）。

trans-unit.source: NoSuchFileException - if the source file doesn't exist.
NumberFormatException - if the string is not a valid representation of a number.
trans-unit.target: NumberFormatException -如果字符串不是数字的有效表示形式。
